Legendary singer Lata Mangeshkar has pledged to donate Rs 1 crore to the families of the Pulwama martyrs. Adinath Mangeshkar, grandson of Master Deenanath Mangeshkar, revealed that the singer will donate the money from her personal account to the NGO Bharat ke Veer, that works for India’s bravehearts under the Ministry of Home Affairs.

Francois-Henri Pinault, Salmya Hayek's French Billionaire husband has extended a monetary help of almost $113 million to rebuild the Notre Dame Cathedral. The 850-year-old UNESCO world heritage landmark in Paris, the Notre Dame Cathedral was swept by a massive fire as it was undergoing renovations on Monday. Reports claim that the inferno collapsed its spire and threatened one of the world's greatest architectural treasures as tourists and Parisians looked on aghast from the streets below.
